name: Hide And Seek (itch) (ENSA-Versailles Studios)
description:
Come and CHILL by playing this new game experience! 

Put yourself in the shoes of a child who, during an outing to the museum, finds himself projected into the world of art where paintings and anamorphoses play hide-and-seek with him. 

Go through the different imaginary worlds to find all the anamorphoses... Will you manage to come back to reality?

Relax and enjoy this immersive  walk to discover three emblematic artists of Cubism. Don't be afraid to bring out your inner child and have fun! Surprises in store for you!

________

This game has been realized within the framework of the Master "Immaterial Project" of the National Superior School of Architecture of Versailles.

Students work in groups of 3 and have two months to produce their game. They have never worked on UE4. They don't know how to program. This is their first experience as developers.

They used the design workflow of the architecture industry to make it.

You may encounter some bugs. Thank you for your understanding and have fun.
